Author
foxBMS Team
Date
2021-09-28 (date of creation)
Updated
2023-02-03 (date of last update)
Version
v1.5.0
Prefix
LED

This module controls the debug LED that is directly connected to a MCU pin. It is used to indicate basic operation states.

  • During startup the LED is enabled continuously.
  • Once the startup is complete the LED should be called with LED_SetToggleTime() in order to indicate whether the BMS has started normal operation (LED_NORMAL_OPERATION_ON_OFF_TIME_ms, slow blinking pattern) or if it is in an error state (LED_ERROR_OPERATION_ON_OFF_TIME_ms, fast blinking pattern).
  • LED_SetToggleTime() can be called anytime the indicated pattern shall change.

Definition in file led.h.

◆ LED_ERROR_OPERATION_ON_OFF_TIME_ms

#define LED_ERROR_OPERATION_ON_OFF_TIME_ms   (100u)

time span to be used with LED_SetToggleTime() indicating an error state

#define LED_NORMAL_OPERATION_ON_OFF_TIME_ms   (500u)

Function Documentation

◆ LED_SetDebugLed()

void LED_SetDebugLed ( void  )

Turn debug LED on.

This function is intended to be called once during startup before LED_SetToggleTime() is called (after startup).
